trans-unit.source: Clears pages from a page blob.
trans-unit.target: Clears pages from a page blob.

trans-unit.source: The offset at which to begin clearing pages, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The offset at which to begin clearing pages, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: The offset must be a multiple of 512.
trans-unit.target: The offset must be a multiple of 512.

trans-unit.source: The length of the data range to be cleared, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The length of the data range to be cleared, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: The length must be a multiple of 512.
trans-unit.target: The length must be a multiple of 512.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the blob.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction</codeEntityReference> that represents an asynchronous action.
